thread.title: Lamar Odom Officially Discharged From Las Vegas Hospital, Airlifted to Los Angeles
thread.title_full: Lamar Odom Officially Discharged From Las Vegas Hospital, Airlifted to Los Angeles

author: AceShowbiz.com
title: Lamar Odom Officially Discharged From Las Vegas Hospital, Airlifted to Los Angeles
text:
Comments The former NBA star was photographed being airlifted in a helicopter to Los Angeles on Monday night, October 19 to continue his recovery. 
Waking up from a four-day coma, Lamar Odom has been officially discharged from his Las Vegas area hospital on Monday, October 19. On the same day, he was transferred to a Los Angeles hospital to receive rehab treatment. A photo has surfaced all over the web showing the former NBA star being airlifted in a helicopter. A source has told PEOPLE the 35-year-old basketball athlete was being transferred from Nevada's Sunrise Hospital to the ICU of the famed Cedars-Sinai Medical Center in L.A. "Khloe and several nurses are with him. Lamar still can't walk but has left the hospital in a bed," the source revealed. Meanwhile, Lamar's estranged wife Khloe Kardashian has been spotted by his side as he left Las Vegas hospital. E! News has several photos of the 31-year-old reality star departing the hospital, wearing all-black loungewear, sunglasses and her hair in a messy bun. "You can tell it's taking a toll on Khloe, but she is staying strong for Lamar," a source told E! News . "She goes everywhere with him. If Lamar leaves the room for testing, she follows."
